General.Name: hGears AG
General.Description: hGears AG develops, manufactures, distributes, and supplies precision components and sub-systems, and system solutions worldwide. The company offers gears, sprockets, shafts, structural components, complete transmissions, and other mission-critical components. Its products are used in e-bikes, and electric and hybrid vehicles, as well as electric power-tools and gardening equipment. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Schramberg, Germany.
